sentences: Ta tegi töö peaga et valmis saada enne õhtu.
(He did the work quickly to be ready before evening).
Tuleb ruttu, meie taksomees juba äratalub!
(Hurry up, our taxi driver is already waiting!).
Peagasti liikus ta mäest alla, et vältida lisa imelust.
(He moved quickly down the mountain to avoid additional beauty).
context: The word 'peaga' is an Estonian adverb meaning quickly or speedily. It's used to describe actions performed with haste or urgency.
